entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:59 PM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early in the morning. Rain mixed with wet snow in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 5:59 PM PST Friday 10 February 2023
